author: Michael Le Page
title: How does coronavirus testing work and will we have a home test soon?
description: Efforts to scale up testing for the covid-19 coronavirus has been slow in some countries, and some tests are more accurate than others, which could make it harder to slow the spread
content:
By Michael Le Page
A swab test is the best way to identify coronavirus infections
Roberto Pfeil/dpa
Because the symptoms of covid-19 are similar to those of other diseases, testing is the only way to know for sure if someone is infected with the coronaviru… [+4555 chars]
